name: Brown Acid
details:
Limited Edition 70's FuzzA Fuzz pedal with the circuit based a 1970's fuzz unit, it delivers a psychedelic silicon saturation, great for Woodstock-type sounds or for sludgy, stoner riffs. It has three controls; output, tone and fuzz, and uses a 9V power supply.
https://www.jimdunlop.com/mxr-brown-acid-fuzz/
